title: Add global error handler
description: Add unhandledRejection and uncaughtException handlers in index.js, plus Express error middleware

title: Add rate limiting middleware
description: Create middleware/rateLimit.js. Track failed auth attempts per IP. Block after 5 failed attempts within 15 minutes. Apply to auth middleware

title: Add RSS feed caching
description: Add node-cache to rssFetcher.js. Cache parsed feeds with configurable TTL (default 1 hour). Add cache invalidation method

title: Update package.json dependencies
description: Add dependencies: node-cache, zod. Add devDependencies: c8, supertest. Add test scripts

title: Add request logging middleware
description: Create middleware/requestLogger.js. Log request method, URL, duration. Generate unique request IDs for correlation. Sanitize sensitive data before logging

title: Create URL validator for SSRF protection
description: Create utils/urlValidator.js to block private IPs and validate protocols. Apply to rssDiscovery.js, feedprocess.js, scraper.js, intel.js

title: Create structured logger utility
description: Create utils/logger.js with Logger class. Methods: info, warn, error, debug. JSON output with timestamp, level, message, metadata. Replace console.log calls throughout codebase

title: Set up test framework
description: Add test scripts to package.json, install c8 and supertest, create test/routes/rss.test.js and test/middleware/auth.test.js

title: Create centralized config
description: Create config/index.js to centralize all configuration. Externalize hardcoded timeouts (10000, 15000, 30000ms), body limits (10mb), max items (20). Update .env.example

title: Fix timing-safe API key comparison
description: Replace === string comparison with crypto.timingSafeEqual() in middleware/auth.js to prevent timing attacks

title: Parallelize webhook calls in intel.js
description: Replace sequential for loop with Promise.allSettled(). Extract duplicate code from addintelurl and deleteintelurl into forwardToWebhook() helper function

title: Add Zod request validation schemas
description: Create middleware/validator.js with Zod schemas for each endpoint. Add zod dependency. Apply validation to routes
